body.name: LINSY HOME Modular Sectional Sofa, Convertible U Shaped Sofa Couch with Storage, Memory Foam, Modular Sectionals with Ottomans, 6 Seat Oversized Sofa Couch with Chaise for Living Room, Blue
features: 【Versatile & Flexible Modular Sofa】 - LINSY HOME Modular couches allow different households to customize various configurations such as a typical L or U shape couch, and update the colors and materials of your sectional sofa covers. It is easy to change a normal sofa into a corner sofa or sectional sleeper sofa bed in minutes. The more you add, the greater opportunity that you get to bend and shape your life at your command

【Changeable Covers & Easily Reinvent Sofa Look】 Imagine if your couch covers are scratched by pets or stained by children, or you get tired of the old color in the future, you will prefer a sofa with changeable covers. LINSY HOME modular sofa gives you the freedom to reinvent your couch anytime with removable, changeable, and machine-washable covers(except the armrest). Please note: For more cover options please contact our customer service

【Incredibly Storage Seat】Every sofa seat has a hidden storage space(20.9*20.9*6.8inch) and it is large enough to put board games, blankets, pillows, CDs, decorations, and so on. A function of making your room tidy

【BIFMA X5.4-2020 Certificated & 300lb Weight Capacity】 - The frame is built with sturdy hardwoods. The weight capacity for each seat is 300 lb. The hardware connector we adopt is as strong as explosion-proof steel and 2 times bigger and thicker than other brands, ensuring a super stable connection among each piece. Linsy Home sofas have passed the BIFMA X5.4-2020 certificate, an authority certificate for the safety, durability, and structural adequacy of the furniture

【Memory Foam Cushion & Safe Polyester Fabric】 The yielding cushions of large sectional couch's are filled with memory foam and steel springs for your relaxation and comfort. The seats are just right — not too soft and not too firm. The sofa fabric is tightly woven 100% polyester, CA65 and OEKO-TEX certificated, which means you can be certain that every component of this article has been tested for harmful substances and that the article therefore is harmless for human health

【Fool-style Assembly & Easy to Move】 No extra tools are needed, it is easy to put the living room couch together even for elderly ladies. The sofa is moved individually so they are great to navigate tricky hallways or tight doorways. No worries when you moving home. Please note: There is a hidden space at the bottom of the armrest, including a box for the hardware and screws

【SEVEN Packages and LIFETIME Warranty】 The maximum capacity of each sofa modular piece is 300lbs. The sofa with storage comes with 7 boxes, which may be delivered at different times. If you have any questions about the tracking numbers or the product, please feel free to contact us. We will respond to you in 24 hours and try our best to solve any problem so as to achieve your 100% satisfaction. We promised a lifetime guarantee on our couch

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Follow This Video to See How Versatile and Flexible the Modular Sofa Is !
Spacious storage space for board games, blankets, toys and so on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Above and beyond
reviews.reviewText: I have never felt more inclined to give a 5-star review for a product or company than this. There was an issue with shipping and half of our new couch got misdelivered. While the delivery company beat around the bush and had non-existent customer service, Linsy Home Direct's customer service responded the very same day, even though it was late at night and sent out replacement pieces the next day after I got back to them.The couch itself is also high quality especially for the price. The assembly is self-explanatory, there is a youtube video demonstrating the way to do it but you might not even need it, it's that easy. Everything you need comes in every box. It took two people about an hour and a half to assemble all the parts and dispose of the packaging. The storage space underneath each seat is invaluable in a <1000 sq. ft. home. The color looks very close to the pictures and the dimensions listed are very accurate.This couch replaced a hand-me-down couch that was originally much pricier than this one. Our old couch was plagued with shoddy construction, strange floor-space wasting angles, flattened cushions, and deep crevasses that led to the internal springs where small objects frequently became lost to time. And it was insanely difficult to haul in and out of homes when we moved it. I am extremely satisified that we now have more seating that takes up less floor space, doubles as storage, and matches our style better.Some considerations, although not at all dealbreakers or really even cons in my opinion: Every part comes in its own box, so there will be a lot of cardboard and plastic wrap to get rid of. cushions take a few days to fully fluff up. Feel very firm at first but light use will break them in more. Locking the pieces together can take a little bit more force than some people might feel comfortable with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Modular Sofa with plenty of storage
reviews.reviewText: Sectional was easy to assemble despite arriving in four packages over the course of a week. All cushions arrived vacuumed sealed and fully inflated after three to four days. The sectional is not extremely firm but firm enough and comfortable. Overall I love the ability to make multiple configurations and would like to purchase the versatile unit they have once available in gray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars We are pleased
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy such a crucial piece of furniture online especially after reading some reviews about issues with the low back. The back sofa pieces are very low and could have been made higher for sure. However I don’t find them digging into my back. You can feel the back of the couch but I would not say it’s uncomfortable. The couch was easy to assemble and is very easy to rearrange for a special occasion. It’s comfortable to sit and lay on and looks nice. The storage is super convenient although I do wish the boards sitting on top of the storage just opened and attached somehow rather than coming all the way off. Haven’t washed it yet but have had to wipe a few baby related spills off of it and it came clean very nice that way. The only two drawbacks I had1. The back really cannot be placed in front of the arm in the corners as shown in the pictures. When you see it in person that way the arm sticks out way past the back and therefore looks really cheap and dumb. We arranged ours with a chaise type lounge on one side using the extra back on the other side in order to put the arm facing out because of this. Not a huge deal but a tad misleading because it doesn’t look that way in the photos. Hoping to be able to contact customer service for a couple additional backs sometime in the future to make both sides the same.2. None of the cushions attach in any way to the furniture. This is the reason I gave 4 stars. Because of this the cushions shift around a lot especially on the parts that are functioning as ottomans. I have to put them in order quite a bit so it doesn’t look wonky. I really wish they had included something to attach them and am planning on adding something myself at least for the bottom ones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Modular sectional
reviews.reviewText: 1st pic in brighter light was after 1st assembling the sofa. 2nd pic in darker light is after about 5 hours later. Cushions all inflated very well. Cushions are firm but comfortable…think memory foam firm. It conforms to you without you sinking in. The couch is heavy and sturdy. Super easy to assemble. I have been wanting a Modular sectional but didn’t want to spend a fortune because I still have 2 young kids so the high end brands were out of the question for me right now. We opted for dark grey as well due to kids and cats lol. Packaging was great and couches arrived in great condition. Came in 7 individual boxes. 4 for the seats, 2 for the ottomans and one box was just the arm rests for the end chairs. Instructions came in the armrest box I believe but I was easily able to watch the assembly video on the product page. I wasn’t sure which box the instructions were in so I just opened them up in the order they would be assembled. Overall very happy with my sofa. My only complaint is there are a few visible ending threads on the seat bases which I wish were cut( I hate that on products) but as long as they don’t come undone I’m fine. The price is amazing considering how insanely high lovesac is. Each piece is fully configurable to be used any way you like so no ugly brackets or different colored fabric on the sides. I was especially sold on the removable cover part! It appears that you can even remove the covers to each seat base as well because they are attached underneath by Velcro. Anyways this is a awesome sofa and I am so glad we ditched our standard sectional for this Modular sectional.
